name: Armored Warfare
content:
files:
- loader: http://static.gc.my.com/ArmoredWarfareMycomLoaderA_en.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/ArmoredWarfareMycomLoaderA_en.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47 win10
    arch: win64
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_47...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: loader
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Armored Warfare...
    executable: loader
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
